Boneless chicken breasts 2 

Salt to taste 

Lemon juice 2 tsp 

Fresh parsley 2 tsp 

Thyme 1 tsp 

Egg 1 

Breadcrumbs 1 cup 

Oil for deep-frying 

Fresh parsley for garnish 


For Dip: 

Mayonnaise 4 tbsp 

Tomato ketchup 2 tbsp 

Paprika powder 1 tsp

1. Slice chicken breasts into bite size pieces and put in a bowl. 

2. Add salt, lemon juice, 1 tsp chopped parsley and thyme. 

3. Rub the pieces well and set aside to marinate. 

4. Break egg in a bowl and beat well. 

5. Add this to the marinated chicken and mix well. 

6. Spread breadcrumbs on a plate. 

7. Coat marinated chicken pieces evenly in breadcrumbs and deep-fry in hot oil till golden and crisp. 

8. Drain on absorbent paper. 

9. To make dip, combine mayonnaise, tomato ketchup, paprika powder and mix well. 

10. Add 1 tsp chopped parsley and mix well. 

11. Garnish crispy chicken pieces with little chopped parsley and serve hot with prepared dip.
